SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
RmiClient, SocketClient
public class Client extends Object
Client class, baseline for building a client that can connect to a server to participate in a game. Contains the generic methods that a client with any protocol can use to interact with the server. The client can be extended to implement specific methods for each protocol.

      serverPort - The port of the server.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This method overrides the toString method for the Client class. It constructs a string representation of the Client object, including the username and the data of all players.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a String representing the Client object.

    • createPlayerData

      public void createPlayerData(ArrayList<String> players)
      Method used to create the player data. It creates the player data for the client player and the opponent data for the other players. Mainly useful for testing.
      Parameters:
      players - an ArrayList of Strings representing the players of the game.

    • drawCardClient

      public boolean drawCardClient(Integer id)
      Method used for drawing a card. It receives the id of the drawn card from the server and adds the card to the hand of the player in the model of the Client.
      Parameters:
      id - an Integer representing the id of the drawn card.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the local operation.

    • placeCardClient

      public boolean placeCardClient(Boolean success, int cardId)
      Method used for placing a card. It receives the id of the placed card from the user interface and removes the card from the hand of the player in the model of the Client.
      Parameters:
      success - a boolean value representing the success of the place from the server.
      cardId - an Integer representing the id of the placed card.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the local operation.

    • placeStartingCardClient

      public boolean placeStartingCardClient(Boolean frontSideUp, Boolean success)
      Method used for placing the Starting Card on the board. It receives the front side of the card from the user interface and the success of the operation from the server.
      Parameters:
      frontSideUp - a boolean value representing the front side of the card.
      success - a boolean value representing the success of the operation from the server.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the placement locally.

    • choosePersonalObjectiveClient

      public boolean choosePersonalObjectiveClient(int objectiveId, Boolean success)
      Method used for choosing the personal objective. It receives the id of the chosen objective from the user interface and the success of the operation from the server.
      Parameters:
      objectiveId - an Integer representing the id of the chosen objective.
      success - a boolean value representing the success of the operation from the server.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the choice locally.

    • choosePlayerColorClient

      public boolean choosePlayerColorClient(Color playerColor, Boolean success)
      Method used for choosing the player color. It receives the chosen color from the user interface and the success of the operation from the server.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - the color chosen by the player.
      success - a boolean value representing the success of the operation from the server.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the choice locally.

    • fetchAvailableColorsClient

      public boolean fetchAvailableColorsClient(ArrayList<Color> availableColors)
      Method used for fetching available colors from the server. It receives a list of available colors from the server and updates the player data accordingly.
      Parameters:
      availableColors - an ArrayList of Color objects representing available colors.
      Returns:
      true if available colors were successfully fetched and updated locally, false otherwise.

    • fetchAvailableGamesClient

      public boolean fetchAvailableGamesClient(Map<UUID,String> availableGames)
      Method used for fetching the available games from the server. If the available games are not null, it sets the available games of the client.
      Parameters:
      availableGames - an ArrayList of UUIDs representing the available games.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchGameStateClient

      public boolean fetchGameStateClient(GameState gameState)
      Method used for fetching the game state from the server. If the game state is not null, it sets the game state of the client.
      Parameters:
      gameState - a GameState representing the game state.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchPlayersClient

      public boolean fetchPlayersClient(ArrayList<String> players)
      Method used for fetching the players from the server. If the players are not null, it creates the player data for the players.
      Parameters:
      players - an ArrayList of Strings representing the players of the game.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchCommonObjectivesClient

      public boolean fetchCommonObjectivesClient(ArrayList<Integer> commonObjectivesId)
      Method used for fetching the common objectives from the server. If the common objectives are not null, it sets the common objectives of the client.
      Parameters:
      commonObjectivesId - an ArrayList of Integers representing the ids of the common objectives.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchPersonalObjectiveClient

      public boolean fetchPersonalObjectiveClient(Integer personalObjectiveId)
      Method used for fetching the personal objectives from the server. If the personal objectives are not null, it sets the personal objective of the client.
      Parameters:
      personalObjectiveId - an Integer representing the id of the personal objective.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchVisibleCardsAndDecksClient

      public boolean fetchVisibleCardsAndDecksClient(ArrayList<Integer> visibleCards, ArrayList<Integer> backSideDecks)
      Method used for fetching the visible cards and the decks from the server. Those are used to compose the draw pile of the game. If the visible cards and the back side of the decks are not null, it sets the visible cards and the back side of the decks of the client.
      Parameters:
      visibleCards - an ArrayList of Integers representing the ids of the visible cards.
      backSideDecks - an ArrayList of Integers representing the ids of the back side of the decks.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchScoreMapClient

      public boolean fetchScoreMapClient(HashMap<String,Integer> scoreMap)
      Method used for fetching the score map from the server. If the score map is not null, it sets the score map of the client.
      Parameters:
      scoreMap - a HashMap of Strings and Integers representing the score of each player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchPlayersResourcesClient

      public boolean fetchPlayersResourcesClient(HashMap<String,HashMap<Resource,Integer>> playersResourcesMap)
      Method used for fetching the player resources from the server. It sets the resources of the players of the client.
      Parameters:
      playersResourcesMap - a HashMap of Strings and HashMaps of Resources and Integers representing the resources of each player. The inner HashMap represents the resources of a player. The String represents the player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchPlayersBoardsClient

      public boolean fetchPlayersBoardsClient(HashMap<String,HashMap<Coordinates,Integer>> playersBoardMap)
      Method used for fetching the players boards from the server. It sets the boards of the players of the client.
      Parameters:
      playersBoardMap - a HashMap of Strings and HashMaps of Coordinates and Integers representing the boards of each player. The inner HashMap represents the board of a player. The String represents the player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchPlayersPlacingOrderClient

      public boolean fetchPlayersPlacingOrderClient(HashMap<String,ArrayList<Card>> placingOrderMap)
      Method used for fetching the players placing order from the server. It sets the placing order of the players of the client.
      Parameters:
      placingOrderMap - a HashMap of Strings and ArrayLists of Cards representing the placing order of each player. The ArrayList represents the placing order of a player. The String represents the player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchValidPlacementsClient

      public boolean fetchValidPlacementsClient(ArrayList<Coordinates> validPlacements)
      Method used for fetching the main player possible card placements from the server. If the valid placements are not null, it sets the valid placements of the client player.
      Parameters:
      validPlacements - an ArrayList of Coordinates representing the valid placements of the client player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchClientHandClient

      public boolean fetchClientHandClient(ArrayList<Integer> handIds)
      Method used for fetching the main player's hand of cards from the server. If the hand is not null, it sets the hand of the client player.
      Parameters:
      handIds - an ArrayList of Integers representing the ids of the cards in the hand of the client player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchStartingObjectivesClient

      public boolean fetchStartingObjectivesClient(ArrayList<Integer> startingObjectives)
      Method used for fetching the main player's starting objectives from the server. This method is used before the "chooseStartingObjective" method. If the starting objectives are not null, it sets the starting objectives of the client player so that the user can choose one.
      Parameters:
      startingObjectives - an ArrayList of Integers representing the ids of the possible objectives of the client player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.

    • fetchStartingCardClient

      public boolean fetchStartingCardClient(Integer startingCardId)
      Method used for fetching the main player's starting card from the server. This method is used before the "placeStartingCard" method. If the starting card is not null, it sets the starting card of the client player so that the user can place it.
      Parameters:
      startingCardId - an Integer representing the id of the starting card of the client player.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing the success of the set operation.
